title: ITP issues traffic plan for 8th Muharram procession in G-7/2
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 04 (APP):Islamabad Traffic Police (ITP) have finalized special traffic arrangements for the 8th Muharram procession scheduled for Friday in Sector G-7/2 to ensure smooth traffic flow and public convenience.
A spokesperson told APP that the procession will start from Ali Masjid, Street No 9, G-7/2, and will pass through Luqman Hakeem Road and Street No 35 before concluding at the same starting point, Ali Masjid.
He said traffic will remain suspended on G-7/2 service road towards Khyber Plaza Chowk and Street No 7A of Fazal Haq Road during the procession.
He said the road from School No 9, G-7/2 towards Awami Market will also be closed for traffic during the procession hours.
He said commuters may use Margalla Road, Jinnah Avenue, and 7th Avenue as alternate routes during the event.
He urged the public to avoid illegal parking near the procession route and park vehicles only in designated areas.
He said citizens are requested to cooperate with traffic police personnel deployed to manage the event.
